flawed_nl_solution:
The first winner will receive 2400 / 3 = $<<2400/3=800>>800.
There will be 2400 - 800 = $<<2400-800=16000>>16000 left.
The other winners will receive 16000 / 10 = $<<16000/10=1600>>1600 each.
#### 1600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1600, not 16000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
